short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Voicer is a browser plugin that brings your selected web text to life through speech using TTS(Text To Speech) technology.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the convenience of having any web page content read aloud with this cutting-edge browser extension. Users can bid farewell to reading fatigue as the extension takes over the task. Simply select the desired text and right click to select the 'Read This' menu. The extension will instantly convert the text into natural-sounding speech, presenting a sleek player interface. Sit back, relax, and let the words come to life as they immerse themselves in a whole new way of consuming online content.
